GSD.description:
ASoC: hdmi-codec: Fix OOB memory accesses

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.8 by commit 1552e66be325a21d7eff49f46013fb402165a0ac. For more details please see the references link.
